title: Auto sector sees resilient two-wheeler growth amidst mixed performance in PVs and CVs for June 2024
description: Wholesale volumes across various segments of the automobile industry in June 2024 are expected to show a subdued trend. This is primarily due to the absence of wedding dates, as stated in an Anand Rathi report. Analysts predict a mixed performance in the market. Two-wheeler (2W) volumes are anticipated to be resilient, while passenger vehicles (PVs) and commercial vehicles (CVs) are expected to see slight declines. Tractor volumes are likely to remain flat.
